raw: * The widget queue handles the deferred computation of certain widget properties.
* It is used e.g. for the tree to update the indentation of tree nodes.
* This queue calls the method {@link qx.ui.core.Widget#syncWidget} of each
* queued widget before the layout queues are processed.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The widget queue handles the deferred computation of certain widget properties. It is used e.g. for the tree to update the indentation of tree nodes. This queue calls the method {@link qx.ui.core.Widget#syncWidget} of each queued widget before the layout queues are processed.

raw: * @type {Array} This contains all the queued widgets for the next flush.

@type.name: @type
@type.body: {Array} This contains all the queued widgets for the next flush.

raw: * @type {Object} This contains a map of widgets hash ($$hash) and their
* corresponding map of jobs.

@type.name: @type
@type.body:
{Object} This contains a map of widgets hash ($$hash) and their
 corresponding map of jobs.

raw: * Clears given job of a widget from the internal queue. If no jobs left, the
* widget will be removed completely from queue. If job param is null
* or undefined widget will be removed completely from queue.
* Normally only used during interims disposes of one or a few widgets.
* @param widget {qx.ui.core.Widget} The widget to clear
* @param job {String?} Job identifier. If not used, it will be converted to
* "$$default".

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Clears given job of a widget from the internal queue. If no jobs left, the widget will be removed completely from queue. If job param is null or undefined widget will be removed completely from queue. Normally only used during interims disposes of one or a few widgets.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
job {String?} Job identifier. If not used, it will be converted to
 "$$default".
@param.description:
Job identifier. If not used, it will be converted to
 "$$default".

raw: * Adds a widget to the queue. The second param can be used to identify
* several jobs. You can add one job at once, which will be returned as
* an map at flushing on method {@link qx.ui.core.Widget#syncWidget}.
* @param widget {qx.ui.core.Widget} The widget to add.
* @param job {String?} Job identifier. If not used, it will be converted to
* "$$default".

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Adds a widget to the queue. The second param can be used to identify several jobs. You can add one job at once, which will be returned as an map at flushing on method {@link qx.ui.core.Widget#syncWidget}.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
job {String?} Job identifier. If not used, it will be converted to
 "$$default".
@param.description:
Job identifier. If not used, it will be converted to
 "$$default".

raw: * Flushes the widget queue.
* This is used exclusively by the {@link qx.ui.core.queue.Manager}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Flushes the widget queue. This is used exclusively by the {@link qx.ui.core.queue.Manager}.
